lines.text: You're Arcade? You're the donor?
And you're too late, Alex. You've always been too late. And now your time is up.
Good thinking, Alex. You're pretty smart for a fucked up paranoid teenager.

[sarcastically]
Thanks a lot.
Who gives a fuck about Arcade anyway?
What do you mean?

[from trailer]
This is 'Arcade', and it's all done in Virtual Reality. It's so real, you'll actually think that you're in the game world!
Games like 'Arcade' go beyond interaction. I'm telling you, man, Virtual Reality is the way of the future!
Stilts, I thought I told you to stay out of here!
Well, I'm just, you know, checking out the preview for 'Arcade'. Check it out, it's gonna be in there, it's supposed to be real cool.
If it's so cool, then how come they're previewing it in this shithole?
Maybe if you weren't such a dick, you'd see how cool this place really is.
Gimme a break, man - they got fuckin' Space Invaders in here, that shit's for retards!
Now kiss reality goodbye... forever!
Just remember, it's only a program, it's not really alive. If things get too intense, you can always push the Escape button, and you're out of the game.
What if the Escape button doesn't work?
Well then... we've got ourselves a pretty big glitch, don't we?

[on Nick's car radio]
Hello Nick. I'm waiting for you, on the other side.
With games like Arcade, supercomputers, and microprocessors, man. They're the wave of the future.
Nick! Alex! All your friends are here.
We know what you are.
A heartless monster, of course.
Fuck you!
Anytime.
[Arcade laughs]
See you on the other side.
[Arcade resumes laughing]
Oh god, I dreamed you were dead.
Sweetheart, I am dead.
You're the donor?
The donor... was a little boy! His mommy hit him until he went to sleep forever. But Vertigo-tronics stole his pain and I was born! Now no one can play with me ANYMORE!
Who gives a fuck about Arcade anyway?
Try saying that... to my face!
I love the beach. For no particular reason at all, I love the beach. But then again...
